Jan 30, 2016

Best winter jacket!!!!

Posted in Kids, Products

So this tiny jacket packs quite a punch!! If you have an eczema prone kiddo [amazon template=iframe image1&asin=B011TQ66T2] like me, it's a necessity to comb through clothes that fall in the "non" category - i.e., non-irritating, non-scratchy, non-inflammatory and this coat really fits the bill! The fir inside is marvelously luxurious (a great option for irritable skin) and the outer shell works as a perfect wind deterrent. The colors are vivid and distinct - my 4 year old picked pink and fits in the 3-4 with just alittle length in the sleeves. If you're on the lookout for a new coat, grab it!

Your little one will thank you!

mommyknowsbest seal of approval!
